project.description: A build with many failures for testing error display

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo "[INFO] Starting failing build..." echo "[WARN] Low disk space detected" echo "[ERROR] Configuration file missing!" sleep 1
echo "" echo "Starting TestCase: DatabaseConnectionTest" echo "[INFO] Running DatabaseConnectionTest..." echo "[ERROR] Cannot connect to database" echo "[ERROR] Connection timeout after 10s" echo "[ERROR] Host: db.example.com:5432" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [DatabaseConnectionTest]: ERROR"
echo "" echo "Starting TestCase: CacheTest" echo "[INFO] Running CacheTest..." echo "[ERROR] Redis connection refused" echo "[ERROR] Cache initialization failed" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [CacheTest]: ERROR"
echo "" echo "Starting TestCase: FileSystemTest" echo "[INFO] Running FileSystemTest..." echo "[ERROR] Permission denied: /var/data/uploads" echo "[ERROR] Cannot create temp directory" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [FileSystemTest]: ERROR"
echo "" echo "Starting TestCase: MemoryLeakTest" echo "[INFO] Running MemoryLeakTest..." echo "[WARN] High memory usage detected" echo "[ERROR] OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space" echo "[ERROR] Test aborted" echo "SUMMARY of TestCase [MemoryLeakTest]: ERROR"
echo "" echo "[ERROR] BUILD FAILED" echo "[ERROR] 4 tests failed out of 4" exit 1
